TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ClientBuildManagerParameter extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含在预编译期间传递给 ASP.NET 编译器的值。

span.span: Contains values passed to the ASP.NET compiler during precompilation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以对 ASP.NET 网页和代码文件进行预编译，以便为用户提供更快的响应，并允许在不部署源代码的情况下部署站点。ASP.NET Web pages and code files can be precompiled to facilitate a faster response for users and allow for the deployment of the site without deploying the source code. 有关预编译 ASP.NET 网站的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 网站项目预编译概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398860(v=vs.100))。For more information on precompiling an ASP.NET Web site, see [ASP.NET Web Site Project Precompilation Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398860(v=vs.100)). 类存储预编译期间使用的值。The class stores values that are used during precompilation. 属性确定如何生成程序集。The property determines how the assembly will be built. 例如，可以将设置 为以 重新编译任何以前编译过的组件，或将其设置为，以 允许生成的程序集覆盖目标目录中的任何组件。For example, you can set to to recompile any previously compiled components, or set it to to permit the resulting assembly to overwrite any components in the target directory. 枚举器有一个 允许其成员值的按位组合的属性。The enumerator has a attribute that allows a bitwise combination of its member values. 属性可以包含来自枚举的多个值 ，以指定预编译行为的组合。The property can contain more than one value from the enumeration to specify a combination of precompilation behaviors. 为 属性或 属性分配一个值，以创建具有强名称的程序集。Either the property or the property is assigned a value to create a strong-named assembly. 不需要设置这两个值来创建具有强名称的程序集。Both values do not need to be set to create a strong-named assembly. 对象 通过构造函数传递给对象 。A object is passed to the object through the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是类概述中的代码示例的一部分 。The following code example is part of a code example found in the class overview. 在此示例中，将 创建一个对象并设置其值。In the example, a object is created and its values set. 生成的程序集将具有基于所提供的密钥文件的强名称，并将根据提供的值进行预编译 。The resulting assembly will have a strong name based on the provided key file and will precompile according to the provided values. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager/VB/source.vb#2)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数不初始化任何属性值。This constructor does not initialize any property values. 创建对象后，必须通过、 和属性设置这些值 。Those values must be set through the , , and properties after the object has been created. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是类概述中的代码示例的一部分 。The following code example is part of a code example found in the class overview. 在此示例中，将 创建一个对象并设置其值。In the example, a object is created and its values set. 生成的程序集将具有基于所提供的密钥文件的强名称，并将根据提供的值进行预编译 。The resulting assembly will have a strong name based on the provided key file and will precompile according to the provided values. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager/VB/source.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置确定预编译行为的标志。

span.span: Gets or sets the flags that determine precompilation behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定如何生成程序集。The property determines how the assembly will be built. 例如，可以将设置 为以 重新编译任何以前编译过的组件，或将其设置为，以 允许生成的程序集覆盖目标目录中的任何组件。For example, you can set to to recompile any previously compiled components, or set it to to permit the resulting assembly to overwrite any components in the target directory. 枚举器有一个 允许其成员值的按位组合的属性。The enumerator has a attribute that allows a bitwise combination of its member values. 属性可以包含来自枚举的多个值 ，以指定预编译行为的组合。The property can contain more than one value from the enumeration to specify a combination of precompilation behaviors. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是类概述中的代码示例的一部分 。The following code example is part of a code example found in the class overview. 在此示例中，将 创建一个对象并设置其值。In the example, a object is created and its values set. 生成的程序集将具有基于所提供的密钥文件的强名称，并将根据提供的值进行预编译 。The resulting assembly will have a strong name based on the provided key file and will precompile according to the provided values. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager/VB/source.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置编译期间使用的密钥容器。

span.span: Gets or sets the key container used during compilation.
A of the value for the key container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为 属性或 属性分配一个值，以创建具有强名称的程序集。Either the property or the property is assigned a value to create a strong-named assembly. 不需要设置这两个值来创建具有强名称的程序集。Both values do not need to be set to create a strong-named assembly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例类似于类概述中的代码示例， 但生成的程序集将具有基于所提供的密钥容器的强名称。The following code example is similar to the code example found in the class overview except that the resulting assembly will have a strong name based on the provided key container. 它将根据提供的值预编译 。It will precompile according to the provided values. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager_2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager_2/VB/source.vb#1)]
